pageContext.claim: “We must protect our borders from the ravages of other countries making our products, stealing our companies and destroying our jobs.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump attacks companies that ship jobs overseas, and has promised to keep jobs in the United States. But this is inconsistent with his long history of outsourcing products as a businessman. We know of at least 12 countries where Trump products were manufactured. Further, Trump products transited other countries through the packaging and shipping process — meaning that workers in more than 12 countries contributed to getting many of Trump’s products made, packaged and delivered to the United States.
